H0.text: Insects are part of a wild turkey's forest community.

H1.text: Rainfall is part of a wild turkey's forest community.

H2.text: Soil is part of a wild turkey's forest community.

H3.text: Wind is part of a wild turkey's forest community.

A4.text: Many other groups of animals have substantial fractions of species living in soil, e.g. about 30% of insects

A5.text: Soil is the main or the sole habitat for many soil organisms
